title: Fix Zyra... Fix Zyra ... Fix Zyra
body:
i love this champ.. awesome design

but .........

shes slow
mana hungry 
here Passive is now bugged
her plants are still dumb.. not as dumb as they where.. but are dumb.. i dont understand moving a problem from one thing to another..
fix her.. fix her fix her....

reduce her mana costs or give her more mana.. i dont care.. but this is literally crap that you leave it like this.



passive bug.. because of that odd amount of time you need to wait for her passive to become active sometimes it just shoots out at a random direction possibly the last direction a person clicked.. this has happened multiple times now..

replies.body: You know, if they gave her something special with her Auto Attacks, they wouldn't have to worry about her plants since just like Heimer's turrets, if you AA an enemy, your plants will focus them until you AA another target or they fully leave the plant's range. If she wasn't such a manawhore, I'd honestly get a Nashor's on her as a CDR item considering AA'ing makes your plants super focus and stop being retarded.
passive is shitty, but her mana and low MS are common issues in many immobile cc heavy mages
Her snare has the least hold time in the league. It's not that much of a snare really, and her ult knockup is hard to hit.

I mean, it can go through minions and can root multiple targets so it's fairly strong in that regard. Very easy to set up a full damage ult with it. If you place your enemies in the center of your ult, the knockup will have a very high chance of being triggered unless they use their flashes/escapes.

She is very good at picking off enemies

Yea I like how it can go through minions and stuff. I'm a level 5 Zyra so the ult isn't that hard for me to hit but for others not used to her it can be. She's a beast at picking off squishies. I just wish they would fix her up.

I feel like the plant AI buff was very nice. I noticed it a ton tbh

Her ult is also great for zoning. Like you can basically control a whole teamfight if you play it right.

Mhm my ult has turned the tides of fights and games sometimes. I love taking her mid more than sup. I've beaten Ahri, Yasuo, Ekko, Zed, among others even a Veigar. Their stunned surprise at my damage is hilarous haha

Yeah she's not a typical match up so most people don't know how to deal with her. I like to wait on firing my passive too if I die cuz half the time people forget she has it or think I forgot to use it

;] surprise kill

Yup I had some tough times against a Diana but I was holding my own and sometimes winning the fights. The times she won I traded back cause of my passive killing her lol. I wish the delay wasn't on it though, that can really hurt the window of you being able to get a revenge kill.

I really wouldn't say Zyra is a heavy CC mage though. She has a snare and her ult has a knock up that's impossible to hit. (Also a slow that nobody really uses). At the very least they could rework her passive to allow good Zyra players to not go oom after 2 - 3 abilities early game.
Is it just me or is this champion the squishiest fucking champ in the game? I laned against her with Azir and two aas from soldiers literally took half her health. Kinda crazy

I play her a lot and I've seemed to notice her plants randomly changing targets again even when they don't move out of the radius. It's prevented me from getting so many kills and really is infuriating. I think all she really needs is some tweaking to her passive and maybe some work on her base stats and she would be fine.

According to people who think that silver badge+champion.gg=ultimate source of knowledge,she's actually really strong right now,and since they are the ultimate source of knowledge,I'm not sure what you're even complaining about,clearly she's strong and pros/top solo q players are just sheep and stupid and need to learn to worship winrates better.

_"I've given you water,
I've given you dirt.
you've given me nothing,
but heartache and hurt..."_
